headline: Eli Manning to Put Together Bid for New York Giants Stake
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Former New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning is putting together an investment group to bid for a piece of the National Football League team, according to people with knowledge of the matter. headline: BofA Awards Critical Funding for Conservation of Historic Artworks
summary: Sixteen cultural institutions have been named as grant recipients of the 2025 Bank of America Art Conservation Project. The selections represent a wide array of artistic styles, media and cultural traditions across the United States, Europe, Asia, Australia and Latin America.

headline: Banks, fintech, and crypto are colliding in the new Trump era
summary: The Trump 2.0 era is producing new crossovers in the financial world as some crypto firms consider applying for banking licenses and some banks consider issuing their own digital assets.
